title: Can't install client for some reason.
body: I used to play on this laptop, which is still really brand new, but I can't get the client to download, and when I uninstalled and reinstalled it, I keep getting the "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working." Any ideas on how to fix this issue?

replies.body:
Patcher kernel errors are generally caused by League lacking certain permissions to run. Since League interacts and accesses a lot of files outside of the install directory, it needs proper system permissions to do so. Our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) will take you through the most frequent fixes, so I recommend giving that a go. 

Let me know if you continue to see issues after working through that guide.
I've also deleted the C++2005 things in control panel but nadda.
